title: The secretary of ladies. Or, A new collection of letters and answers, composed by moderne ladies and gentlewomen, collected by Mounsieur Du Bosque. Translated out of French by I.H.
author: Du Boscq, Monsieur.
publisher: Printed by Tho. Cotes, for William Hope, and are to be sold at the signe of the Vnicorne in Cornehill neere the Royall Exchange,
notes: A translation of: Nouveau recueil de lettres des dames de ce temps avec leurs responses.
Translator's dedication signed: Ierome Hainhofer, patritius Augustanus.
With an additional title page, engraved, signed: G. Glo: [i.e. George Glover] fecit.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
